DOC.brief_summary: Implantable cardioverter defibrillator ( ICD ) may capacity provoke worsen ventricular tachyarrhythmias ( VT ) . It report ICD shock increase mortality . This study aim determine role back-up pacing-induced VT ( PIT ) overall ICD shock burden avoid pause-related ventricular back-up pace program pace output sub-threshold level ineffective pacing .
DOC.brief_title: Sub-threshold Pacing Prevent Pacemaker-induced Ventricular Tachycardia
DOC.criteria: age > 18 year implant ICD occurrence pacemakerinduced VT documentation pauserelated syncope AV block sicksinus syndrome young 18 year
